channel.title: XSLT on Digital Forays
channel.description: Recent content in XSLT on Digital Forays

item.title: More _Turn of the Screw_ HTML Testing
item.description: All right, so let’s do a little bit of testing of the whole XML through XSLT process to get an HTML version of James’s The Turn of the Screw with all my colored tags for it. Here we go!
